text: Hanki zamagra ana 4'a fugo namuma zamarenea vahe'mo'zama Siria vahe kumapima ehanatite'za, mago seli nompi ufre'za kazana, ne'zane tine me'nege'za ome eri'za nene'za, silvane, goline tavaraveraminena eri'za ome fraki'naze. Ete mago'ene e'za mago seli nompi umareri'za mago'a zantamina eme eri'za ome fraki'naze.
